attributes.action: that david cameron, george osbourne and ian duncan smith should be made to live a week on £53.
attributes.additional_details: That the arrogant Mr David Cameron, Mr George Osbourne and Mr Ian Duncan Smith should be made to live off £53.00 per week like the people on jsa, and should be made to pay for their electric and gas weekly out of it like the rest of the country and if they dont agree should be made to resign as they would have had no interest in the damage they are causing with their bullying ways.
